DOC.brief_summary: This Phase I/II study is designed to assess the safety and therapeutic effect of INCB007839 in combination with trastuzumab and vinorelbine in patients with metastatic HER2+ breast cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of INCB007839 With Trastuzumab and Vinorelbine in Patients With Metastatic HER2+ Breast Cancer
